statusDetails.message:
AssertionError: Unexpected status code 400 for status=active, tag=hgt, date_type=days
assert 400 == 200
 +  where 400 = <APIResponse url='https://api.my-agnks-dev.xdevs.uz/api/v1/admin-statistics/stations/activities/counts/?search=&region_id=%5B%5D&district_id=%5B%5D&end_date=2025-10-06T17%3A00%3A32Z&order=station_name&status=active&tag=hgt&date_type=days' status=400 status_text='Bad Request'>.status
